description: Unique ID of the asset/unit this meter entry applies to; likely a foreign key to the equipment or vehicle master record (confirm target table with SME).
Code for the meterâ€™s type/units (e.g., miles, kilometers, engine hours); confirm valid code set with SME.
Numeric value read from the device at the time of capture (e.g., odometer or hourmeter); units and interpretation are determined by the type code.
Indicator that this value should override calculated or prior readings (manual entry/adjustment). Blank likely means no override; confirm allowed values and logic.
